.pro files

beta.pro

Finds the center of N whole suns and M partial suns using limb-fitting for the whole suns and simple centroiding for the partial suns

centroidwholesuns.pro

Finds the centers of a triple-sun image and loads all relevant information including offsets and angles into a new structure.

Checks image

Defines solar thresholds

everysun.pro

Finds the rough centroiding centers of any and all suns

fid_locate.pro

Locates the whole and sub-pixel positions of fiducials in a cropped solar image

idsuns.pro

Defines solar regions

Fits 2nd order polynomial to limb strips

Makes limb strips from whole strips

Makes limb strips from whole strips
